description: From Hindi ख़ुशी (xuśī), Urdu خوشی‎ (khušī), from Persian خوشی‎ (xoši, “happiness”).

adjectives.description: cushy (comparative cushier or more cushy, superlative cushiest or most cushy)

examples: When Char shifts is a really cushy job. Mostly I just sit around drinking tea.

entries.meaning: (chiefly US) Comfortable, often in a way that will suit a person's body; ergonomic.
